event.title: Newton writes a school notebook on Ovid now in Babson collection [NAR]**
Newton reports his optical experiments to Royal Society
Newton's letter is printed in Phil Trans
Newton decides not to publish his optical lectures when faced with queries [PON]
Collins tells Gregory that Newton said he will no longer publish on math and exact sciences [PON]
Newton sends Oldenberg 'Discourse of Observations' and 'Hypothesis of Light' [NAR]
Newton hosts Halley who wants to talk about the inverse square law
